text: @SecPompeo You can't represent World Health Experts, WHO can. WHO has been working closely with China since the outbreak of COVID-19 and has clarified the situation in detail. You can't just blame China to cover up your dereliction of duty. You are accountable for 70,000 deaths in the US.
